title: niyallavO
sahitya:
neeyallavO, enRandaitaay neelakaNDaa, Satguruvum 

(neeyallavO)

 

anupallavi



naayalla luRuvadupOl NYaanamilaariDan dinam

pOyallaluRavE ennaip puvidanil paDaittaayO 

(nEEyallavO)

 

caraNam



aasaikkayiRRaal kaTTuNDu aRivizhan tallalkoNDu

anbenunduNaiyumviNDu aiyOveeNpoyyiluzhnRu

*naasamuRuvadaik kaNDu naadaanee magizhvukoLLum

naaDagamidu pOdumE naanOragadiyallavO

(neeyallavO)
